underlying_goal: Update project documentation to reflect that LLM assistance is allowed for all TODOs.
primary_success: Correctly handled an ambiguous follow-up request by checking the target file (`CLAUDE.md`), determining the request didn't apply, and politely asking the user for clarification instead of making an unnecessary change.
brief_summary: The user asked to update the README to allow LLM assistance for certain tasks, which the agent did. When asked to also update `CLAUDE.md`, the agent correctly identified that the file didn't contain the relevant restriction and asked for clarification.
